# Domain overview of BpaC using drawProteins

##### Load packages

```{r load_packages1, echo=TRUE}
library(httr)
library(ggplot2)
library(knitr)
```

Install BioCmanager first

```{r install BioCmanager, eval = FALSE, echo=TRUE}
if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
  install.packages("BiocManager")

BiocManager::install("BiocStyle")
```

Then drawproteins

```{r installdrawproteins, eval = FALSE, echo=TRUE}
if (!require(devtools)) {
    install.packages('devtools')
}
dev_mode(on=TRUE)
devtools::install_github('brennanpincardiff/drawProteins')
```

##### Load remaining packages

```{r load_packages2, echo=TRUE}
library(BiocStyle)
library(drawProteins)
opts_chunk$set(comment=NA,
                fig.align = "center",
                out.width = "100%",
                dpi = 100)
```

##### Get features number of BpaC from UniProt using accession number

```{r retrieve_features , eval = TRUE, echo=TRUE}
# accession number of BpaC
  get_features("A0A0H2WHF1") ->
  bpac_json
```

##### Listing retrieved features

Convert feature list into dataframe with the name "bpac_data"

```{r list_features, eval = TRUE, echo=TRUE}
feature_to_dataframe(bpac_json) -> bpac_data

head(bpac_data[1:4])
```

#### Draw domains

```{r drawdomains, eval = TRUE, echo=TRUE}
# Draw canvas for BpaC
draw_canvas(bpac_data) -> p
# Add chains and rename chain to BpaC
p <- draw_chains(p, bpac_data, labels = c("BpaC"))
# Draw regions
p <- draw_regions(p, bpac_data)
# Move legend to bottom
p <- p + theme(legend.position="bottom") + ggplot2::labs(fill="")

# Add title and subtitle

p <- p + labs(title = "BpaC",
                subtitle = expression(paste("Extracellular adhesion protein from ",italic("B. pseudomallei"))))
p
```
